name: Vegan Alfredo Sauce
description: This is the best vegan alfredo sauce ever! Easy to make with just a handful of ingredients and ready in 15 minutes or less. No one will know it's vegan! Makes about 4 cups of sauce.

recipeIngredient: 12 ounces fettuccine or pasta of choice, for serving
1-2 tablespoons olive oil (or water for oil free)
2 cups unsweetened almond milk (cashew/soy/coconut also fine)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil, then add the pasta and cook according to package instructions. Drain, then add it back to the pot and cover until the sauce is done.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring 4 cups of water to a boil. Pour the hot water over the cashews and let soak for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring 4 cups of water to a boil. Pour the hot water over the cashews and let soak for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat the olive oil (or water) in a small pan over medium heat. Once hot, add the chopped onion and garlic and saute for 5 minutes, until fragrant and the onion is translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, heat the olive oil (or water) in a small pan over medium heat. Once hot, add the chopped onion and garlic and saute for 5 minutes, until fragrant and the onion is translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the cashews and discard the soaking water. Add them to a blender along with onions/garlic, unsweetened almond milk, nutritional yeast, lemon juice and salt. Blend until very smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the cashews and discard the soaking water. Add them to a blender along with onions/garlic, unsweetened almond milk, nutritional yeast, lemon juice and salt. Blend until very smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the sauce over the pasta and stir. If the noodles are still hot, you may not need to cook it any more. If you want, heat the pasta with the alfredo sauce on low heat until warm. Serve immediately.
